item.description:
Dance to the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra, featuring 21-year old John Stevens on vocals. John will be singing classic big band tunes as performed by Frank Sinatra, Bobby Darin, and Harry Connick Jr. As a 16-year-old, John finished sixth in the third season of American Idol and is now completing his final year at Berklee before resuming his recording career! Catch him while you can!

Also featured at this dance is 21-year-old female vocalist Dana Lauren, who has sung in Arturo Sandoval's band.

The band plays from 8:30 to 11:00pm. For a video from a previous dance, click here.

Save money and buy tickets in advance, online on Beantown Swing Orchestra's website: www.beantownswing.com

The Concord Scout House is an 18-century barn that was renovated into a dance hall in the 1940s, when big bands came to town and played there. Today it offers dancing to live bands four times a week. It's like stepping back in time!
item.how_to_find_us: Frank will be on stage conducting the band. Can someone assist with the group?

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: American Idol Swing Dance in Concord, Mass.
